channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Buffett passes the torch — here’s what Berkshire loyalists should know, from a longtime insider
item.description: Buffett’s CEO successor Greg Abel may bring a change in style, greater collaboration.

item.title: My ailing father’s house burned down in the California fires. Will our brother, who took care of them, lose his inheritance?

item.title: How Warren Buffett went from picking horses to picking stocks — and what you can learn from it

item.title: These overbought stocks could be due for a pause
